files
Class Scenario

java.lang.Object
  files.Scenario

public class Scenario
extends java.lang.Object

Author:
Arnaud Bellec Represents a game scenario and all data linked to it like player, board, unit data as well as the success/failure conditions. A Scenario can only created via a corresponding XML file.

Constructor Summary
Scenario(java.io.File f)
          Creates a new Scenario object using a XML file.
 
Method Summary
 java.lang.String getDescription()
          Gets the description that is contained in the XML file.

          Gets the name of the scenario.
 java.lang.String getWorld()
          Gets the world file in which the scenario happens.
 void loadBoard(Board b)
          Loads the scenario to the given board.
static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
          For testing purposes.

getName

public java.lang.String getName()
Gets the name of the scenario. Each scenario should have a unique name, so that it can be used to identify them.

Returns:
the name of the scenario, as a String object
